0:
auth:
  - user: scans
    group: scans
    uid: 568
    gid: 568
    password: scans
global:
  - "force user = scans"
  - "force group = scans"
  - "create mask = 0644"
  - "directory mask = 0755"
share:
  - name: Scans
    path: /share1
    browsable: yes
    readonly: no
    guestok: no
    comment: "Printer scans"
    veto: yes
echo starting; apt update -y; apt install postgresql-client -y; apt install dnsutils -y; sleep 31449600; echo done;

until [ -f /snapshots/kopia.repository.f ]; do
    printf "\e[1;32m%-6s\e[m\n" "Awaiting for the Kopia repo to become ready ..."
    sleep 1
done

[kubernetes]
  driver = "usbhid-ups"
  port = "auto"
  desc = "Tripp Lite 1500VA SmartUPS"
  vendorid = "09AE"
  productid = "2012"

MONITOR kubernetes@localhost:3493 1 upsmon secret primary
SHUTDOWNCMD "/sbin/shutdown -h +0"
POWERDOWNFLAG /etc/killpower
POLLFREQ 15
POLLFREQALERT 5
HOSTSYNC 15

[upsmon]
  password  = secret
  upsmon primary
  actions = SET
  instcmds = ALL
